description: Just in time for Movember!  If you're getting ready to grow your mustache, it's important you plan it out and decide what type you want to grow.  This comprehensive app offers you descriptions of a large number of moustache styles, a bit of their history and even gives you a photo of a famous person with said mustache!  Amongst the mustaches covered are The Handle Bar, The Fu Man Chu, The Pencil, The Horseshoe and many many more!  Download it today and make sure you're ready for Movember!
